issue.title: [Python] Use oldest-supported-numpy for declaring numpy version build dependency
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14447](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14447). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In the `pyproject.toml` file we need to specify the numpy version to build against, and this needs to be the "oldest supported version" which depends on the python version you are running. 

The https://github.com/scipy/oldest-supported-numpy meta package helps with this.

cc `[~kszucs]`
